overview: The video clips reference airports, libraries, urban capes, and futuristic tunnels. The audio clips reference archivismâ€¦..its practitioners, its addicts and its effects. Archivists can of course be simultaneously useful and maddening.
tagline: The Archivists is a fifteen minute video work consisting of downloaded video sequences courtesy of Pixabay and four voice-over texts.
title: The Archivists
